p: Many different approaches can be used to model, and possibly derive predictions from incidence data (e.g. Cori et al., 2013 ; Nouvellet et al., 2018 ; Wallinga & Teunis, 2004), and are best implemented in separate packages (e.g. Cori et al., 2013 ). Here, we highlight three simple functionalities in incidence for estimating parameters via modeling or bootstrap and the two specialized data classes that are used to store the models and parameter estimates.
